lessons.title: Intro
info: My name is Stu Peters and I am a Co-Founder & Director of Business Development
at ChainSafe Systems. I am trained in Web Development and a Blockchain enthusiast since 2013.
I am passionate about this technology because itâ€™s all built using the open source ethos;
because there are no barriers to entry, and everything is handled as transparently as possible.
I will guide you through the basics of blockchain and I hope I will manage to inspire you
to join the quest for a more decentralized world!
If you have any questions or comments, please ping me on the chat (@stupeters187).
